website_summaries.verdict: These premium bowling shoes deliver a terrific blend of style and function.
pros: Feature a fabric lining and padded tongue to reduce the risk of foot soreness and blisters
Microfiber soles make it easier to slide
Wide width ensures bowlers with wide feet can wear these shoes comfortably
Khaki trim further enhances the shoe's sleek, contemporary appearance
cons: May be too slick or too narrow for some bowlers

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bowling shoes! They are so roomy and comfortable, that I wish Dexter made a version for outside of the bowling alley. Since switching to these shoes from the bowling alley rentals, my average has gone up a whopping twenty pins! If you have wide feet, and are in need of fantastically comfortable bowling shoes, I cannot recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: If u got $50 u don't need - 1 star update
customer_reviews.text: Not a very wide shoe. No slide - constantly soap stoning so as not to break my neck on approach - pretty disappointed New update- Poor Quality!!! Went to tie my shoes last night at bowling, pulled on the the tongue and it came out of shoe. I've never pulled a tongue out of a shoe in fifty years of tying shoes. See photo. As this happened within 30 days of purchasing - these are being returned without interest in replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: my size 12 shoes usually fit with room in the toes, these are right up to the end but wearable. The soles and sides make these a very comfortable shoe. The wide width is plenty wide and I have extra wide feet. I would take others advice I've seen, if possible order a 1/2 size larger than your normal shoes for bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DaDozer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I now need a wide fit shoe. I ordered them a size larger than my current bowling shoes (11M). These may be "wide" in China where they are made but they are not wide by US standards!! I have medium shoes that are wider than these!!
customer_reviews.author: Nrsmith

customer_reviews.title: Dexter bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were listed as wide but were very tight, and felt like medium width at best. There was also excess material around the tongue on the inside that, due to tight fit pressed into my foot and made it unbearable to wear. The overall construction and quality appeared to be acceptable except as noted above. Amazon accepted the return for credit without question and is a strong customer service point.
customer_reviews.author: R. Carman

customer_reviews.title: Very poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bowling shoe. I bowl in 1 league. I used the shoe maybe 20 times last season. 5 weeks into this season the tongue of the left shoe pulls out of the stitching. The right shoe is ready to do the same thing. Since you use it so few times of course it is out of return or replacement period. Can't believe Dexter would produce something of this poor a quality. I will never buy Dexter again. Bowling, Golf or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: tpthomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly comfortable! I'm going to have to check if Dexter sells street shoes, love these things! I didn't need to break them in at all, perfect right out of the box. Fit was right on to my size and the Extra Wide width was spot on as well. The slide was natural for me, not too slick and not too sticky. This is one part of my game I'll never have to worry about again.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good overall shoe at a pretty good value. My only concern is that they fit a little small. I would suggest a 1/2 size larger than what if wear (if possible). I typically wear a size 13 shoe which allows my feet a little room. I ordered a 13 and even though they fit, they are a little snug.
customer_reviews.author: Family Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Refund lacking
customer_reviews.text: Make absolutely certain the shoes are the right size before bowling any games with them. They felt fine when I tried them on. I ordered a half size larger as suggested. After bowling a few games, my feet hurt terribly because they were still too small. When I returned them, they only refunded $21 of a $52 purchase. The only sign they were worn was minor scuffs on the sole from playing a few games.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gilroy

customer_reviews.title: I went with next size up
customer_reviews.text: Just leaving this for those struggling with sizing information, like I was. The posts here really helped (though I had to read several, and “average” them in my head). I wear 10.5 4E normally, but per the description, I ordered next size up: 11. The fit and comfort is awesome! A wee bit long for me, as 11 always is, but the arch and width is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great look.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and cushioned Nice room in the toe box without being too wide Look really sharp Black and Tan laces included. To address the issue people have raised, the felt on the sole does indeed not extend all the way to the toe. The toe does sort of curve up though so I don't see a problem, I'll update if so.
customer_reviews.author: tjwash

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today and there is something white all over the soles. Also sticky residue on the sides. They appear well made otherwise. Also not very wide for being advertised as such. I do not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes fit very well and happy after two trips to the local Alley. I have flat feet and need support .. I was able to pull out the Dexter liner and slide in mine and it all fit perfectly . I am just a weekly recreational bowler.... Need to have at least one hobby that my wife can whip me in lol.
customer_reviews.author: BJBB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 4E sneaker/shoe, but can't get that in a bowling shoe. These are reasonably comfortable, though. I wish they could be a bit wider, but for a few hours at a time, they work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Good bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable pair of bowling shoes. I have about 20 games on them and they look new. The fit is perfect and I am a 13 wide. Also came with a spare pair of black shoe laces....thick heavy laces
customer_reviews.author: bobj401

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very picky when it comes to shoes because he has wide/flat feet. His normal shoe size is 10.5W. I got him size11 as recommended and he LOVES them. He hasn't worn them with his inserts yet but his inserts do fit inside with is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: FireRose94510

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bowling shoes I have ever owned. The product was delivered on time and was as advertised. I have nothing negative to say, my experience has been an enjoyable one.
customer_reviews.author: James Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and have not used them for bowling yet, but did try them on for size. Amazed at how well they fit and how comfortable they are! They look like they are very well made, can't wait to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: What a fit!
customer_reviews.text: Read the directions and order a 1/2 size larger, I did and they fit perfect, even on my EEEE feet. Came with extra shoelaces and where very comfortable, right out of the box. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yep, got that.

customer_reviews.title: Good bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bowl in several houses and have different bowling bags for each alley so the bags have certain shoes in each one as well...that's the purpose I got these for and I'm happy with my decision...itgey fit my wide feet well and the laces are super nice also
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Seem like well-made shoes
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn these more than 5 or 6 times yet, so I can't testify how they last, or if they break down rapidly, but they're very comfortable when new. They fit well & are nice-looking. No negatives so far.
customer_reviews.author: BH in Sacramento, CA

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, was a bit confused that each shoe had a sliding pad, but it worked out well after all. Shoes are comfortable. Glad I ordered the shoes one size bigger than my normal shoe size— fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have not bowled in them yet, but I tried them on and they feel like a dream compared to the rental shoes I have used for 30 years. Highly recommend, and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: warchildnyc

customer_reviews.title: need to be broke in some
customer_reviews.text: They are great bowling shoes. once you have broke them in, they fit and feel great . I will buy them again
customer_reviews.author: bob s

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice bowling shoes, wide enough for my 13 EEEE feet, if still a bit snug. Recomended for anyone looking for wide bowling shoes under $100
customer_reviews.author: Heath W

customer_reviews.title: Yea.....Blood Flow To The Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. A little tight at first. After wearing a couple of times to break in.....fit well now. Size 12 wide.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DEAL!  PERFECT AND REASONABLY PRICED
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for replacement for his bowling shoes and the exact same shoe was $169 at our bowling center. I was ecstatic when. Found these for less than 1/2 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cline

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with these shoes, I bought pair for my son for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: C. Costanza

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bowling shoes for my husand. He says they are OK. He has a wide foot and is hard to fit. These shoes fit him well.
customer_reviews.author: Gitterich

customer_reviews.title: Totally Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these primarily to reduce the cost of bowling when my wife and I go. We don't bowl much but we've bowled enough over the last year that we had basically paid for two pairs of shoes in rental fees. Anyway, these shoes were just what I expected. I actually ordered the wrong size (my own mistake) but they were exchanged with no hassle and quickly. They fit true to my normal size and black laces were include in addition to the standard white laces.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Go one size bigger, especially if you have wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: My previous bowling shoes of the same style (10.5) started to feel uncomfortable & I needed a bigger size when I play bowling; I have wide feet & low arches. Like my regular walking/running shoes, I chose size 11.5 so that my toes have extra room to move without getting scrunched; I added arch support insoles for extra comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: I'm terrible right now
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the bowling game. I'm terrible right now! lol! But a least I won't have uncomfortable bowling shoes on my feet. These shoes are really comfortable and for the price you can't beat them. I strongly recommend them to a beginner bowler who wants comfort along with the avoidance of potential athletes feet from some of the shoes that bowling alley provides. Yuk!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte B.

customer_reviews.title: The only  choice in bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Dexter is all I’ve used in bowling shoes for decades. Nothing better!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit very comfortable sizing is right not sure how they hold up haven't used them
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes ! This is exactly the same shoe I had before and everything is still the same - very comfortable right out of the box (wide width), very durable (my previous pair lasted 10 years), and a very reliable slide. Greatly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Most bowling shoes are too narrow for my feet. These are great. As comfortable as sneakers, slide beautifully, look decent, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I like the way they look
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they look. i have used them 4 times and it seems the slide part is coming off already ??
customer_reviews.author: bigj

customer_reviews.title: Dexter bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfortable. Good on the lanes. Dexter is the best.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: they look like old style nurses shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit, needed a wide width, but I'm not crazy about the look, they look like old style nurses shoes. But will use them as they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CareerThinker

customer_reviews.title: Could be wider.
customer_reviews.text: Not as wide as I had hoped. I am a EEE and these shoes are a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The Most Comfortable and Stylish Pair of Shoes I Own
customer_reviews.text: Fool your friends into thinking you're a good bowler when you walk into the alley carrying these. If I could wear them outside and everywhere else, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Timo

customer_reviews.title: Dexter bowling shoes make the grade.
customer_reviews.text: My Dexter bowling shoes arrived and fit exactly as I expected and would jighly recommend them to anyone in the market for new shoes. They arrived on time and in excellent packaging. I am very satisified with this purchase, now I just have to improve my average in my new league.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Finazzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and plenty wide enough for my feet. I am super happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jojo22

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these because I am on a bowling league. They are ok.
customer_reviews.author: lovinmycoors

customer_reviews.title: Met it's expectations
customer_reviews.text: OK in fulfilling as a replacement Used to effectively slide on the approach on the bowling lane in delivery of my bowling ball
customer_reviews.author: Bob Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: Bowling in comfortable shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's always difficult for me to find shoes to fit. I love bowling but could never find shoes to fit correctly. I have bunions so I always look for extra wide shoes. These bowling shoes are so comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes because my ones were worn out. They fitted very tight due to the newness, but after a few wears, they fit perfect. At my local bowling center, I have worn the shoes and they slide perfectly. I changed out the khaki shoe strings for black ones. I would purchase this pair of shoes again if I needed a new pair. I highly recommend this shoe for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pony23tail

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and excellent quality. My first shoe purchase on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RGS2010

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot an have a hard time finding normal shoes, let alone bowling shoes. These fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Dexter Turbos and I really like the fit and style of this shoe. It has a nice conservative look without screaming "look a bowling geek!". The slider sole works very well (keep it covered with booties when you're off the lane). Highly recommend these shoes. The fit is very true and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain shoe
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Very comfortable. Took a little bit longer to break in the slide than I was used to. Good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, I have a 4E foot width and these shoes fit great
customer_reviews.author: Arroyo Ricky

customer_reviews.title: so far they fit and feel great.. can't wait to go bowling
customer_reviews.text: Just got the shoes...so far they fit and feel great..can't wait to go bowling again
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fit my wide feet perfectly.  No need to buy 1/2 size larger as suggest by the supplier.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit perfectly. No need to buy 1/2 size larger for me. Perfect width. I have EE feet.
customer_reviews.author: Hemlockfen

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my feet after about 8 times of wearing them
customer_reviews.text: They fit ok at first but then slowly started hurting my feet on the bottom ...I notice the insole is very cheap . Bought new insoles and I'll see how that works out.
customer_reviews.author: Trinidadgt07

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Beginner 2-handed bowler. Been a month and a half since I purchased them and so far I love everything about them. Sturdy and comfy. Good slide. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: keunil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These wide width bowling shoes fit nicely, are well constructed, and look very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: CandB M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Received just as advertised. Comfortable and fit to size. Great quality looking forward to a great season of bowling.
customer_reviews.author: wile9455

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These were a last minute replacement before a tournament, and worked nicely. Out of the box, the slider was a little slick... But after a little scuffing they were perfect. True fit, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J & L Harman

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy!
customer_reviews.text: For a supposedly wide-fitting shoe they are more narrow in the front than my last pair that were normal width. ALSO, after two wearings the tongue came off one of the shoes while lacing. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Feel good after breaking them in
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very stiff when I got them. So much so that my skin was chafing around the top edges of the shoe. But after a month of weekly bowling (12 games), they softened up and felt much better. Now after two months they feel great. Very comfortable and they slide w/ no problems. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: John Carleton

customer_reviews.title: For the money.....
customer_reviews.text: they aren't bad, but I would not call them a true wide shoe.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these 7 years ago.They are very sturdy and comfortable. Saves the cost of renting shoes every time you bowl. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: First bowling shoes and I find these comfortable and seems to be nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are comfortable, easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable, easy to keep clean, and don't stick or slip at the bowling alley. They're in that great in-between area where you'll slide your foot when you want, but won't slip or trip.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Turbo II Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because he has wide feet and it can be a challenge to rent comfortable shoes at the bowling alley. He likes the low-key styling and says they feel like wearing sneakers and are very comfortable. They fit as expected and he's worn them several times now and is pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Thornberry Gatwick

customer_reviews.title: style
customer_reviews.text: I got these new shoes and love them very comfortable and look good to it took a few games to break in the pad on the bottom but just use some power and your go to go no more renting used shoes for me that only god know how many people used them yuck it was only about 40 dollars with shipping so a good price 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kevin burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: shoes were as described, size right on, my husband loves them
customer_reviews.author: MAF

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but poor durability
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were comfortable and fit well but the shoe's soles started separating after only 2-3 months of use. For the price I expected these to at least last a year minimum. With the number of times I actually got to use them, they were only barely better value than just renting shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Chin

customer_reviews.title: A great bowling shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were exactly what I expected. They fit perfect, they have a great feel. They work perfect when I bowl. I definitely recommend these if you are looking for a good bowling shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Bowman

customer_reviews.title: My second pair, Love My shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My bowling average went up by 20 pins ! Just Kidding . But I really like my shoes!
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN MC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Dexter brand, and have been using them for years. I needed a replacement when my present pair finally went, and received the replacement as promised. As with all Dexter shoes I have had, these are of high quality and meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Roth

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Decent price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Still breaking it in. Will update later on quality.
customer_reviews.author: jenny and andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Replaced shoe laces with tie-less laces making them ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly. Very comfortable. Replaced shoe laces with tie-less laces making them easy to put on/take off so I don't inadvertently wear them off outside of the lane area. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: surprised
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, and perform to par. I didn't know what expect buying shoes online, but I'm happily surprised with the results. The shoe provides a great slide. With any new shoes you will have to break them in, but I would recommend these shoes to any bowler.
customer_reviews.author: PoohBear

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, not too tight. Perfect for my feet; 8EE.
customer_reviews.author: jerryq1000

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Longevity yet to be determined but many dexters last long... went a size big but disintegrated need to even with wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Liked shoes !
customer_reviews.text: I bought those shoes for my husband. He likes the design of the shoe. Top quality. Very nicely stitched. Came with an extra pair of black laces.(I didn't knew that and bought extra ones. lol) He loves the shoes! Thank you. I'll buy again :D
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Best bowling shoes I have ever owned. More comfortable than my regular shoes I wear around the house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and feel amazing!!! I could sleep in these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Leist

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Looking at these shoes in the photo, they seemed like they had ample room in the toe box and width. However, when my husband tried them, they were too tight for his E width foot. Other than that, they were nice shoes

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Received these today! Really impressed with these bowling shoes! Overall they seem to be very well made. True to size and very wide! They come with a extra pair of black laces! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: David Gritz

customer_reviews.title: Is a 2EE not a 4EE so go larger to get extra width
customer_reviews.text: Truly wide feet get 1/2 size larger. Is a 2EE not a 4EE so go larger to get extra width.
customer_reviews.author: David L Weissman

customer_reviews.title: Bowling Shoes that fit
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes fit well (using the half size larger as suggested), and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis R Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: No more renting shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bowling shoes and I really like the fit, because I have wide feet and was able to order them wide and they are perfect. I love the fact I no longer pay for the rental of bowling shoes because I have much better shoes of my own.
customer_reviews.author: General Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a nice looking shoe and it seems comfy even tho I have yet to bowl in them and wear for extended periods of time. Looks good with a pair of kaikis for the stitching matches. If you are like me you have to coordinate those colors to look your best. lol
customer_reviews.author: lil tate

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are extremely comfortable, but couldnt keep them on the lanes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are extremely comfortable, but couldnt keep them on the lanes...way too slick causing me to foul or loose my balance each time i tried to bowl...
customer_reviews.author: Unlike28

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet and these for perfectly!! Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second Pair In 8 Years
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I had to buy a new pair is because I lost my old Pair... Seven years and they were still the most comfortable shoes I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance McClure

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure the width is going to work for me. I feel pressure on my small toe.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I picked this shoe because of the wider width and good reviews/ratings. I found it to be a good value and it fit my EE width perfectly with a pair of athletic socks.
customer_reviews.author: Coach K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Good Good Good Good Good Good Good Good Good Good Good Good Good
customer_reviews.author: Eli T Conner Jr

customer_reviews.title: Very good bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: I tried my new shoes last night in my bowling league & they worked out very well. These shoes do seem to run a little on the narrow side as I did return them for a pair 1/2 size larger (size 11 ). I also did have to use some powder on the slidesole in order to get them to slide, but this is normal for every new pair of bowling shoes I have purchased. I really like them. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. This is the only bowling shoe company ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This is the only bowling shoe company product that I like. Order arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Norman W Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Exact Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these shoes. Despite many reviews that say the sizing in wrong mine (8 1/2) fit perfectly. I also have high arches and these shoes have the room to accommodate my arches comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Kriebel

customer_reviews.title: best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: incredibly comfortable shoes, and my average went up by 50 pins just from wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bowlers delight
customer_reviews.text: These bowling shoes are my boyfriend's favorite. I think it's his third pair. Very sturdy and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole in Calistoga

customer_reviews.title: Having the right size is everything.
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet . It's very hard finding any shoe that fits right. The bowling shoes fit good and I'm totally satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hood

customer_reviews.title: one great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: size was just right. also in sole is one of the best that I have found in a bowling shoe. and I have worn out about 20 pair. the slide is great I did not expect the micro fiber on the slide works great
customer_reviews.author: EVAN CLESS

customer_reviews.title: These fit great, I am a 13EE and it is hard ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, I am a 13EE and it is hard to find wide shoes. I was concerned buying these online but they were perfect and have sliding pads.
customer_reviews.author: PE Florida

product_meta.title: Dexter Turbo II Wide Width Bowling Shoes
product_meta.description: Soft Durable Man-Made Upper.Fully Fabric-lined with Padded Tongue and Collar.Non-Marking Classic Rubber Outsole Raised Heel.Microfiber S8 Slide Soles on both shoes.
feature_bullets: The #1 bowling shoe in the world
The bowling shoe sizes run half size smaller than the typical shoe size a person wears. For example if you wear a size 10 tennis shoe get a 10.5 bowling shoe.
